analysis.description:
Steak.addMember (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#469-485) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- memberId[targetMember] == 0

Steak.addMember (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#469-485) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- memberId[targetMember] == 0
Steak.removeMember (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#485-490) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- memberId[targetMember] == 0

SteakToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#76-78)
SteakToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#75-76)
SteakToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#76)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/22/0x880d6adb5bb4c8a7f578d31a4ddb0c48bc590fa3.sol#587-588:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
